text: Y’abra mo (sε mobεware) mo maamenom, ne mo mma mmaa, ne monua mmaa, ne mosewaanom, ne mo maame nua mmaa, ne monua mmarima mma mmaa, ne mo nua mmaa mma mmaa, ne mo maamenom a wͻn ama mo nufoͻ anom, ne monua mmaa a (monfri eni anaasε sekorͻ na mmom) mone wͻn anom nufu korͻ, ne moyere nom maamenom, ne momma nnoma mmaa a mona mohwε wͻn soͻ a wͻ’yε moyere nom a moakͻ wͻn ho mma mmaa; nasε monkͻͻ wͻn (maame) ho deε a, εneε bͻne biara nni moso; εna mo mma mmarima a wͻ’firi moara mosisi mu yere nom. (Y’abra mo nso) sε mobεka nnua mmaa mmienu abom (aware wͻn), gyesε deε atwa mu. Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakyε Hene, na Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunu Hene
